definition: shrink or flinch from no difficulty or danger/make light of difficulties and dangers

sentences.english: Fight the rapids as you kayak and raft down the vast Mekong River.
sentences.chinese: 當你的皮船和木筏衝進湄公河時和急流的艱險戰鬥。

sentences.english: Inman tong-held embarked on a long dangerous way home.
sentences.chinese: 英曼就此踏上了漫長艱險的回家路。

sentences.english: Then there are the few brae souls who grab at its horns and hang on at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 只有極少數的靈魂不畏艱險，不惜一切。

sentences.english: The soldiers are face their difficulties directly without fear.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們直面困難，不畏艱險。

sentences.english: To his credit, Mr. Obama did not sugarcoat the difficulties ahead.
sentences.chinese: 鑑於奧巴馬的信用，他並沒有粉飾未來的艱險。

sentences.english: The official said the vice governors trekked into Yingxiu after many hardships and several close brushes with death.
sentences.chinese: 副州長徒步走了很多路，幾近艱險才成功進入映秀鄉。

sentences.english: They are all heroes grasping the nettle.
sentences.chinese: 他們都是迎着艱險上的英雄。

sentences.english: Though his ways are hard and steep.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他的路程是艱險而陡峻。

sentences.english: It is your fearlessness of danger and difficulty who brings hope to people in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 是你們的不畏艱險給絕望中的人們帶來了希望。

sentences.english: After several adventures, Li made his way through the Kuomintang lines and reached Yenan.
sentences.chinese: 他歷經艱險，穿過國民黨的封鎖線，到了延安。

sentences.english: The Japanese government is embarking on a long and perilous road to resuscitating its bank system.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府踏上了復興其銀行業的漫長而艱險的征程。

sentences.english: And ZuoShaoQing know current situation dangerous, at any time may sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 而左少卿知道目前處境艱險，隨時可能犧牲。

sentences.english: She's daring and she knows exactly what she's looking for.
sentences.chinese: 她不畏艱險，清楚地知道她要尋找的是什麼。

sentences.english: After further adventures alone on a raft he eventually reached the island.
sentences.chinese: 他獨自乘着木筏，經歷了很多艱險，終於到了島上。

sentences.english: Life is a dangerous valley, only the brave people.
sentences.chinese: 生命是一條艱險的狹谷，只有勇敢的人才能通過。
